resources.string: Customize elements to be displayed in power menu
Toggle the visibility of icons in statusbar
Use inverted layout for navbar buttons
Swipe down with three fingers to take a screenshot
Enable advanced reboot options in powermenu
Alpha value of the On-The-Go overlay.
Pressing the volume keys will wake your device
Long press volume buttons to switch tracks while screen off
Long press power button while the screen is off to turn on the flashlight
Press on color below to apply
Enter device idle more frequently and wake up less
Restrict apps from running in the background
Enable Aggressive Battery automatically when using battery saver
Show a brightness slider in the quick settings panel
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Change the default font of the lockscreen clock widget
Display 4G icon in signal icon instead LTE
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Double tap on the lock screen to put the device to sleep
Double-tap status bar to put the device to sleep
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Disable heads up from these applications
Block access to certain sensors for some apps to save battery
Disable expanding quick settings on secure lock screens
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Hide Left-Right Shortcuts on secure lock screens
Miscellaneous things to be checked here
Automatically turn on for these apps
Fnatic mode will turn on automatically when these apps are opened and turn off when they are closed
Block all headsup messages except calls
Disable hardware buttons when Fnatic mode is turned on
Lock screen brightness when Fnatic mode is turned on
Try detecting and adding fnatic apps automatically
Toggle to enable disable hw keys
Haptic feedback on action instead on press
Allow to use Home button when device is ringing
Enable backlight with timeout only on button touch
Show heads up only for dialer app and disable all others
Replace clear all text with nice button
Show clear all notifications button in quick settings instead of default text one
blurs darkened background behind quick settings
Show spacer above settings actionbar for easier use with one hand\nNOTE: restart settings app to see effect
Useful if the device actually has rounded corners
Controls whether the navigation bar is displayed
Prevent interaction with navigation buttons while the screen is being touched
Choose which system navigation style to use
Customize navigation bar style and behavior
Change the default font of the lockscreen date widget
Change the default font of the lockscreen owner info
Show visualizer bars while playing music
Use a smooth lava lamp style color blend animation
Hide smart replies to save screen space with peeking notifications
Whether to show R style notification headers (Requires a SystemUI restart)
Enable the ability to show and use the power menu dialog while on the lockscreen
Show the reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the advanced reboot option on the lockscreen
Show the screenshot option on the lockscreen
Show the torch option on the lockscreen
Drag selection on the area you want to take as a screenshot
Customize screenshot attributes like time, delay,type etc
Pulse flash when there\'s a call waiting
Unlock device with fingerprint after reboot or lockdown
Customize battery icons, hide or show percentage
For better visibility on bright images
Select a local or remote image
Set QS background color from Wallpaper
Disable custom QS styles for external theme engines
Set QS background color from System Accent
Show data usage in qs header
Shows data usage in quick settings header of sim used for data
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Place indicator in either status bar or expanded header (recommended for displays with notch cutouts)
Use accent color for qs tile icons and background
In order to add your own icon, select the top left icon and use the OnePlus 6T FP Customizer app to select the icon you want.
Shows an animation while reading your finger
Choose the appropriate pressed state behavior for your device
Icons/colors may vary depending on which device you are using.
Change the enter/exit animation of the power menu
Enables Custom filter when powermenu is active
Are you sure you want to reset themes-accent to default?
Are you sure you want to reset these colors to default?
Configure notification light on per-app basis
Blink LED for battery in Do Not Disturb mode
Blink LED when battery level is low
Color range to be used for the bar
Animate the battery bar when the device is plugged in
Use a custom color when the device is plugged in
Display battery level for the connected bluetooth device, if available
